flawed_nl_solution:
In four years, Hans will be 8+4=<<8+4=12>>12 years old.
Then Annika will be 12*3=<<12*3=63>>63 years old.
So Annika right now is 63-4=<<63-4=59>>59 years old.
#### 59

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 36, not 63. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
